rules_text:
Multikicker {1}{W} [i](You may pay an additional {1}{W} any number of times as you cast this spell.)[/i]
When Helmsguard Warcaller enters the battlefield, exile X target creatures, then return them to the battlefield under their owner's control, where X is the number of times Helmsguard Warcaller was kicked.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +1/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
